個班on9高登仔整左D meme出來以為好好笑
https://lihkg.com/thread/558222/page/5?ref=web&post=121
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth Golden the Wane? I thought not. It's not a story Joseph would tell you. Darth Golden is a forum legend. Darth Golden was a online forum lord of Hong Kong, so famous and so powerful he could use the Plastic to influence the pop culture to create trend...He had such a knowledge of the plastic, he could even keep the members he had from leaving.
The dark side of the Plastic is a pathway to many abilities some normies consider to be unnatural.
He became so influential… the only thing he was afraid of was losing his members, which eventually, of course, he did. Unfortunately, he left LinZai everything he knew, then LinZai killed him in his scandal. Ironic. He could make others to be a trend, but not himself.
